artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Author: Yamana Tomesaburō; Author: Masukawa Kan'yū; Publisher: Fukyūsha; Carver: Tsuchiyama
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: light blue cover, red and tarnished silver text R; label L; pages of text with 3 color images including two weavers, a young man offering goods to Western soldiers, and a figure praying under a tree; several other black and white images
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Color Prints of Stories for Moral Education (Nishiki-e shūshindan 錦絵修身談)
title: Color Prints of Stories for Moral Education, vol. 1
